00053 class SafeOffset
00054 {
00055 public:
00056         SafeOffset( unsigned int* offset ) : _offset( offset ), _scratch( 0 ) { }
00057 
00058 //      SafeOffset& operator ++ ( int )                         { if ( _offset ) ++( *_offset );        else ++_scratch;        return *this;           }
00059         SafeOffset& operator ++ ()                                      { if ( _offset ) ++( *_offset );        else ++_scratch;        return *this;           }
00060         SafeOffset& operator += ( unsigned int i )      { if ( _offset ) ( *_offset ) += i;     else _scratch += i;     return *this;           }
00061         SafeOffset& operator = ( unsigned int i )       { if ( _offset ) ( *_offset ) = i;      else _scratch = i;      return *this;           }
00062 
00063         operator unsigned int ()                                        { if ( _offset ) return *_offset; else return _scratch; }
00064 
00065 private:
00066         unsigned int*   _offset;
00067         unsigned int    _scratch;
00068 };
